string.name: springMotion_response_info
string.value:
Equals to the length of animation when dampingFraction = 0, 
also equals to the time taken for the spring to vibrate once.

string.name: springMotion_dampingFraction_info
string.value:
[0，1) smaller value is more bouncing, won't stop if set 0 
1 critical value, the standard velocity decreasing effect 
(1, ＋∞) bigger value is slower gradual stop
